DIA_Ilse_VZ_Train_03_01: Come on, show me what you got.
DIA_Ilse_VZ_Train_Back_03_01: I've never dealt with such a trained warrior. I won't show you anything new.
DIA_Ilse_VZ_Train_2H1_13_01: This trip was supposed to be profitable. You weren't talking about that kind of money, were you?
DIA_Ilse_VZ_Train_2H5_13_01: This trip was supposed to be profitable. You weren't talking about that kind of money, were you?
DIA_Ilse_VZ_Ambient_03_01: I'm in one piece, I don't need anything else to be happy. Well, maybe just the great treasures that are out there somewhere.
DIA_Ilse_VZ_Ambient_03_02: Good. I'm waiting for more undead to treat them with my hammer!
DIA_Ilse_VZ_Ambient_03_04: That's great. You're lucky we were able to find whole piles of valuables while you were chasing your errands.
DIA_Ilse_VZ_Ambient_03_05: You can rest assured. Those piles of rubble are no match for my hammer!
DIA_Ilse_VZ_Ambient_03_03: I gotta hand it to you, you've taken us to a really lovely place. Let's just hope there's something more here than these ridiculous crystals.
